Description.enUS:
Defensive structure.
Infantry fights and cast abilities from inside.

Bonus: +1 range to units inside.

Tooltip.enUS: Targets and attacks the target unit until it is destroyed or moves out of range.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать атаковать цель, пока она не будет уничтожена или не выйдет из зоны досягаемости.

Tooltip.enUS: Targets and attacks the target unit until it is destroyed or moves out of range.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать атаковать цель, пока она не будет уничтожена или не выйдет из зоны досягаемости.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам прекратить выполнение всех задач и остановиться.

Tooltip.enUS: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приказать выбранным боевым единицам прекратить выполнение всех задач и остановиться.

Tooltip.enUS: Throw a grenade that hit enemies in a small area, deals 8 damage and reduces their attack and sight ranges by 2 for 2 seconds.
Sends unloaded infantry units to designated point.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отправляет выгруженные войска в указанную точку.

Tooltip.enUS: Loads infantry into Bunker.
Selects the unit constructing this structure.
Tooltip.ruRU: Выбрать рабочего, который сооружает это строение.

Tooltip.enUS: Unloads all units.
Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Tooltip.ruRU: Приостановить сооружение этого строения. Впоследствии его можно будет продолжить.

Tooltip.enUS:
Warp the building to the targeted powered location.
Takes 8.0/6.2/5.5 seconds to finish at Power Level 1/2/3.

Warning: once Warping is triggered, it cannot be canceled.
This will also cancel any ongoing production.
Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Tooltip.ruRU: Отменить сооружение этого строения, уничтожив его и получив частичную компенсацию.

Tooltip.enUS:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.

Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.

Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.

Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Targeted unit is stunned for 8 seconds (3 seconds against heroic units).
Deals 32 damage (64 against armored/massive) to target enemy ground unit over 8 seconds and slows them down by 50%.
Drain a nearby ally shield to recharge up to 0 shield points of the target.
A careful shot, dealing 150 damage. Ignores armor.**Can only target psionic**
Targets and attacks the target unit until it is destroyed or moves out of range.
